name: ListUserNotifications
description:
Retrieve notifications for the authenticated GitHub user.

This tool retrieves all notifications for the authenticated GitHub user, sorted by most recently updated. It should be called when the user wants to check their latest notifications.

parameters.name: notifications_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Return notifications updated after this timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: filter_notifications_before_date
parameters.description: Only show notifications updated before the specified ISO 8601 timestamp (`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`).

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated before the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of the notification results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of notifications to display per page, with a maximum limit of 50.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 50).

parameters.name: include_read_notifications
parameters.description: Set to `true` to include notifications marked as read in the results.

value_schema.description: If `true`, show notifications marked as read.

parameters.name: only_show_participating_notifications
parameters.description: If true, only shows notifications where the user is directly participating or mentioned.

value_schema.description: If `true`, only shows notifications in which the user is directly participating or mentioned.
